      • printResult

        public static void printResult(java.sql.ResultSet result,
               boolean continuee,
               java.util.Scanner scan)
        It displays results stored in result. If variable continuee equals false, then it comes back to calling function. Otherwise it goes to menu, or exits.
        Parameters:
        result -
        continuee -
        scaner -

      • changePassword

        private static void changePassword()
        method to change password. Static, because it is called from other static methods.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main method. It runs when client starts application. Here client signs in and then can work as patient, doctor or pharmacist (of course it depends on rights in data basis).
        Parameters:
        args -
